scripts.build: yarn nameflick-image:build && yarn nameflick:build && yarn graphql:build && yarn image:build && yarn ipfs:origin:build && yarn axolotl:origin:build && yarn discord:build
scripts.image:origin:build: esbuild src/lambda/image/origin.ts --banner:js="import { createRequire } from 'module';const require = createRequire(import.meta.url);" --platform=node --format=esm --target=node14.19 --bundle --external:sharp --external:ipfs-http-client --outfile=../../deploy/.layers/image/origin/index.mjs
scripts.image:build: yarn image:origin:build && yarn image:accept:build && cd ../../deploy && yarn build:layer:sharp
scripts.ipfs:origin:build: esbuild src/lambda/ipfs/origin.ts --banner:js="import { createRequire } from 'module';const require = createRequire(import.meta.url);" --platform=node --format=esm --bundle --target=node16.14 --external:ipfs-http-client --outfile=../../deploy/.layers/ipfs/origin/index.mjs && cd ../../deploy && yarn build:layer:ipfs
scripts.axolotl:origin:build: esbuild src/lambda/axolotl/index.ts --banner:js="import { createRequire } from 'module';const require = createRequire(import.meta.url);" --platform=node --format=esm --target=node16.14 --bundle --external:canvas --outfile=../../deploy/.layers/axolotl/index.mjs
scripts.nameflick-image:build: esbuild src/lambda/nameflick-image/index.ts --banner:js="import { createRequire } from 'module';const require = createRequire(import.meta.url);" --platform=node --format=esm --target=node16.14 --bundle --external:canvas --outfile=../../deploy/.layers/nameflick-image/index.mjs && cp -r ../../packages/assets/fonts ../../deploy/.layers/nameflick-image/fonts
scripts.graphql:build: esbuild src/lambda/graphql.ts --banner:js="import { createRequire } from 'module';const require = createRequire(import.meta.url);" --platform=node --format=esm --target=node16.14 --bundle --outfile=../../deploy/.layers/graphql/index.mjs
scripts.discord:interaction:build: esbuild src/discord/lambda/discord.ts --banner:js="import { createRequire } from 'module';const require = createRequire(import.meta.url);" --platform=node --format=esm --target=node16.14 --bundle --outfile=../../deploy/.layers/discord-interaction/index.mjs
scripts.discord:deferred:build: esbuild src/discord/lambda/deferred.ts --banner:js="import { createRequire } from 'module';const require = createRequire(import.meta.url);" --platform=node --format=esm --target=node16.14 --bundle --outfile=../../deploy/.layers/discord-deferred/index.mjs
scripts.discord:cli:build: esbuild src/discord/cli.ts --banner:js="import { createRequire } from 'module';const require = createRequire(import.meta.url);" --platform=node --format=esm --target=node16.14 --outfile=dist/discord-cli/index.mjs
